no_permissions: You do not have permissions to access this.
wheel_already_exists: A wheel with this name already exists.
delete_wheel_desc: Are you sure you want to delete wheel %s? This action cannot be undone.
wheel_not_exists: A wheel with this name does not exist.
wheel_blip_desc: Enable or disable the blip for this wheel.
wheel_blip_name_desc: The name of the blip that will appear on the map.
wheel_blip_sprite_desc: The sprite ID for the blip.
wheel_blip_color_desc: The color ID for the blip.
wheel_blip_scale_desc: The scale of the blip on the map.
wheel_name_desc: A unique identifier for the wheel (no spaces or special characters).
wheel_label_desc: The display name for the wheel that players will see.
teleport_to_wheel_desc: Teleport to the location of wheel %s.
global_cooldown: There is a global cooldown active. Please wait %s minutes before spinning again.
personal_cooldown: You must wait %s minutes before you can spin the wheel again.
not_enough_items: You need %s x%s to spin the wheel.
